segments.text: So , Karen , what do you do in your free time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I like to play the piano .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? How long have you been playing piano ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: About 18 years , I started learning when I was a kid .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s really interesting . you have to play for me some time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , so , what about you ? Do you have any hobbies ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I collect beer mats . I ’ m not sure that counts , though .
segments.speaker: S1
